recipe_name: Chicken and herb salad with onion mayonnaise
author: Paul Rankin
method: For the salad, mix together the chicken and herbs in a clean bowl, and set aside.  For the onion mayonnaise, place  the egg yolks, onion and white wine vinegar into a food processor and blend until smooth. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Once it looks slightly thickened begin to gradually add in the olive oil, blending constantly. To serve, mix the onion mayonnaise into the salad.
ingredients: 1 ready-cooked chicken breast, roughly chopped,  handful fresh sage,  handful fresh coriander,  handful fresh parsley,  handful fresh mint,  handful fresh dill,  handful fresh basil,  3 free-range egg yolks,  2 tbsp caramelised onions from a jar,  Â½ tsp white wine vinegar,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  150ml/5fl oz olive oil
